title: FS Addie Joss M116 Sporting 1910-11 Sporting Life
author: Michael McGuffin

posts.post_title: FS Addie Joss M116 Sporting 1910-11 Sporting Life
posts.post_content:
I have for sale this morning a 1910-11 M116 sporting life Addie Joss card.

Card is ungraded but in nice secure case, looks to be in poor-fair condition.

If interested, please email me [url]michael.mcguffin@hotmail.com[/url] for pictures.

All forms of payment accepted, prefer paypal gift.

I would like 150.00 shipped

Reducing price before listing on Ebay, price reduced to 130.00 shipped.

Email to [url]michael.mcguffin@hotmail.com[/url] for pictures.

Hi Mike,

You may have better luck listing this under Pre-WWII cards (E, D, M, W, etc..) B/S/T rather than on the T206 B/S/T page. Best of luck with the sale.

Hi, can the moderator of the site move it to the appropriate spot for me or will I need to start a new thread under the correct location?  I accidentally put it here, sorry..... 

Thanks for the advice!
